titleStmt.title: The Pope's late mock-procession, on Qu. Elizabeths crownation day, revenged upon Mr. Remmingtons, nose Being a relation how a piece of it was bit off by J. C. a life-guard man.

notesStmt.note: The events in question took place on "Sunday the 14th of this instant March 1679".
Copy filmed cropped at head, slightly affecting title.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
